series_description: This series documents policy and informational studies performed by DHP and/or Boards at the request of other governmental agencies, offices, or the public. This series may include, but is not limited to: studies and unique data collected or created as part of the studies.

series_title: Applications, All Professions: Documentation Without Application
series_description: This series documents application supporting documentation received by the Board without a previously submitted application for all practitioner & facility licenses, registrations, certifications, permits, or other authorization. This series may include, but is not limited to, certifications, correspondence transcripts
This series documents the results of an individual's for licensure, certification, or registration. This series may include, but is not limited to: individual score reports and Jurisprudence exams.

This series documents the examination process for an to be issued a license, registration, or certification. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications for examination, approved candidate list, registration forms, score report and statistical summary reports.

series_title: Applications, Facility: Incomplete, Expired, Withdrawn and/or Denied
series_description: This series documents incomplete, expired, withdrawn, and/or denied facility application files pending licensure, permitting, registration, certification, or other authorization. This series include, but is not limited to: application, licenses from other states, credentials from professional organizations, criminal background checks, passport photos, and resumes

series_title: Applications, Practitioner â€“ Exam Eligible Candidates for Licensure with Authorization to Practice
series_description: This series documents all initial applications for examination which satisfactorily completed all educational and experience requirements for licensure, certification, registration, or other authorization, and had been deemed eligible by the Board to for its examination. This series only applies to applications for examination where the candidate must be issued a resident or other temporary license to gain the experience required to be deemed eligible. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications; registration and verification of supervision; and exam approval letters.
retention_statement: 1 Year after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: This series documents license applications received without fees. This series may include, but is not limited to: certifications, correspondence and transcripts.

This series documents completed applications for of a license, registration, certification, permit, or other authorization that is not currently valid, and is pending a final decision of the Board. This series may include, but is not to: application and supporting documentation, including information on impairments and criminal convictions

series_title: Applications, Practitioner: Denied Licensure or Other Authorization
series_description: This series documents completed initial applications for licensure, registration, certification, permit, or other authorization that have been denied by the Board for any reason. This series may include, but is not limited to, application, correspondence, examination and endorsements.

series_title: Applications, Practitioner: Incomplete, Expired, and/or Withdrawn
series_description: This series documents incomplete, expired, and/or withdrawn applicant/trainee files pending approval for licensure. This series does not include applications received without fees or application files for exam-eligible candidates for licensure who have previously been issued a temporary authorization to practice. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications; registration and verification of supervision; coursework outline forms; official transcripts; monthly review results; and exam approval letters.

This series documents incomplete and/or expired applications for reinstatement for a previously issued, currently invalid license, registration, certification, permit, or other pending completion by the applicant. This series may include, but is not limited to, application and supporting documentation, including information on impairments and criminal convictions

series_title: Board Budget Information Related to Fee Setting Process
series_description: This series documents the determination of professional fees. This series may include but is not limited to: projected board revenues and expenditures; cost center expenditures; biennial revenue and expenditure fee analysis.
retention_statement: 10 Years after end of state fiscal year

series_description: This series documents the complaint, investigation, inspection and adjudication of possible violations of laws and/or regulations for regulated facilities and applicants, as well as disciplinary action taken against said facility. This series may include, but is not limited to: evidence, notice, and final of the Board
retention_statement: 65 Years after equipment, facility, or property sold or no longer in use

series_description: This series documents the complaint, investigation, and adjudication of possible violations of laws and/or regulations regulated practitioners and applicants, as well as any disciplinary action taken against said regulant. This series may include, but is not limited to: evidence; notices and orders; documentation of final case disposition and/or Board action taken; confidential consent agreements (CCAs); and documentation to update a doctor's profile when there is an action/claim

This series documents complaints that are closed by the enforcement division such as investigations of unlicensed activity or complaints closed at case intake. This series may include, but is not limited to: initial complaint, investigation worksheet, case intake interview documentation, report or memo of investigation, documentary evidence, closure letter, and correspondence.

This series documents the completion of actions required per probation order. This series may include, but is not limited to: order and supporting documentation of compliance with the probation or terms of the order.

This series documents investigations of alleged violation of law or regulation for a licensee of any Board or allegations of unlicensed practice. This series may include, but is not limited to:working notes and working copies of the investigatory report used in the preparation of the final investigative report.

series_title: Drug Destruction Records: Board of Pharmacy
series_description: This series documents court-ordered drug destruction by the Department of Forensic Science or police departments. This series may include, but is not limited to: court orders for drug destruction

series_title: Drug Theft and Loss Forms: Board of Pharmacy
series_description: This series documents theft or loss of controlled substances which must be reported by any registrant or licensee. This series may include, but is not limited to: report forms

This series documents the application process for schools and companies wishing to provide a program of nursing, nurse or medication aide education. This series may include, but is limited to: applications, correspondence, curriculums, notices, and board approval related documents. 54.1-3013; to 3006.2

series_title: Education, Nursing Programs: Closed Nursing Programs
series_description: This series documents the initial approval to operate and close nursing and nurse aide education programs, and medication aide training programs. This series may include, but is not limited to: approval and closure letters.

This series documents the discipline process for medication aide, nursing or nurse aide education programs. This series may include, but is not limited to: complaint, investigation and reports, and records related to the adjudication of possible violations.

This series documents the graduation records of students from closed education programs for nursing, nurse aide and medication aide. This series may include, but is not limited to: transcripts, certificates of completion and lists of graduates.

series_title: Education, Nursing Programs: Program Compliance Reviews
series_description: This series documents the review of currently approved education programs for nursing, nurse aide or medication aide for compliance with regulations. This series may include, but not limited to: survey report, faculty information, clinical agency forms, visit summary, documentation of any issues with curriculum and documentation of any other deficiencies.
retention_statement: 2 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_title: Health Practitioners Monitoring Program: Client Case Records
series_description: This series documents monitoring services provided to healthcare practitioners who may be impaired by a physical or mental health disorder, or who may suffer from a substance abuse disorder. This series may include, but is not limited to: Monitoring Program Committee (MPC) decision and action correspondence; reports; contracts; compliance status reports or notices; substance toxicology screening records and client-released treatment provider records; worksite monitoring records; case progress notes; and phone logs

series_title: Health Practitioners Monitoring Program: Monitoring Program Committee Meeting Proceedings This series contains privileged and confidential
series_description: documents of the proceedings of the Health Practitioners' Monitoring Committee (MPC). Includes confidential materials used to or support decisions of those individuals who have been participants in the program. This series may include but is not limited to: MPC case report packets, case worksheets, and documents of committee decisions and actions
retention_statement: 65 Years after end of calendar year

series_title: Licensure, Facility: License, Registration, Certification, Permit, or Other Authorization
series_description: This series documents the activities associated with the licensing, registration, certification, permitting or other authorization of a regulated facility. This series may include, is not limited to: documentation of changes to facility, architectural layouts, theft or loss of drug reports, audit reports, and innovative programs documentation
retention_statement: 65 Years after equipment, facility, or property sold or no longer in use

series_title: Licensure, Long-Term Care Administrators: Change of Administrator Notifications
series_description: This series documents the notification received by the Board a change in the current, licensed supervising administrator or acting administrator in a nursing home or assisted living This series may include, but is not limited to, correspondence.

series_title: Licensure, Practitioner: License, Registration, Certification, Permit, or Other Authorization
series_description: This series documents the activities associated with Boardissued licenses, registrations, certifications, permits, or other authorizations of individual practitioners. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, transcripts, licensure and/or disciplinary verification information from other states, address and name change requests and documentation, and licensure compact declaration of primary state of residence (PSOR)

series_title: Licensure, Practitioner: Practitioner Profiles with No Actions/Claims Boards of Medicine & Dentistry
series_description: This series documents actions taken to update physician and oral and maxillofacial surgeon profiles into the Virginia Health Provider system when there are no actions or claims against doctor. This series may include, but is not limited to: physician or surgeon profile questionnaires, supplemental forms, and Emergency Contact Information (ECI) forms.
This series documents audits of licensees as required by regulations. This series may include, but is not limited to: audit letters, proof of continuing education, and late renewal.
This series documents information required to renew licenses. This series may include, but is not limited to: license renewal forms.

This series documents the process for an entity to request and receive an advisory opinion from the Board of Heath Professions as to whether the entity appears to comply with Practitioner Self-Referral Act. This series may include, but is limited to, applications and advisory opinions

series_title: Prescription Monitoring Program: Requests for Waiver/Exemption from Reporting
series_description: This series documents the process for prescribers, veterinarians, and other authorized users to request a waiver exemption from reporting to the Prescription Monitoring Program. This series includes, but is not limited to, Requests Waiver or Exemption from Reporting form & supporting documentation

This series documents the user registration process required prescribers, pharmicists, and other authorized users to access to the Prescription Monitoring Program. This series includes, but is not limited to: registration form and supporting documentation.
